import{createClient}from'@supabase/supabase-js';const supabaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL;const supabaseAnonKey=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY;console.log('üîç Supabase: Environment variables check:',{REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL:!!supabaseUrl,REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY:!!supabaseAnonKey});if(!supabaseUrl||!supabaseAnonKey){console.warn('Supabase credentials not found. Using mock data.');}export const supabase=supabaseUrl&&supabaseAnonKey?createClient(supabaseUrl,supabaseAnonKey):null;// Mock data for development when Supabase is not configured
export const useMockData=!supabase;console.log('üîç Supabase: Client initialized:',!!supabase);console.log('üîç Supabase: Using mock data:',useMockData);
